TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PeerContactCollection extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>

Docs.summary: Represents a container for elements. An instance of this type is returned by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.GetContacts%2A> static method.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This collection holds instances of the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> element, which specifies information about a peer within a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>.
No public constructors are defined for this class.
